message.content: Yes, the authors mention the total amount of compute and type of resources used. Specifically, they state that the empirical investigation was carried out on a desktop PC equipped with an AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 16-Core Processor and required less than 24 hours for all the MDP families and scenarios considered.

Yes, the authors include the total amount of compute and the type of resources used in the Appendix D of the paper. They mention that the empirical investigation has been carried out on a desktop PC equipped with an AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 16-Core Processor and required less than 24 hours for all the MDP families and scenarios.

Yes, the authors mention the total amount of compute and the type of resources used. They state that the empirical investigation was carried out on a desktop PC equipped with an AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 16-Core Processor and required less than 24 hours for all the MDP families and scenarios.
